reviewText: I wanted the french version.  This is formated for European DVD players.  It is totally unplayable on US DVD players.  Basically it sucks big time.

This movie is so precious! It's so cool to see how everyone's lives are connected in some way. It reminds me of the movies, Valentines Day and New Year's Eve. While yes it can be clich at times, it's wonderful. You need to watch it.
